item.description:
LAST MINUTE VENUE CHANGE - FAT BELLY'S!!!!!

Unfortunately, The Abbey decided to pick THIS Monday to do a kitchen renovation, and will be closed. So we'll be going to FAT BELLY'S PUB instead!!!!

Welcome to the Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and events in Providence.

This week's location is: Fat Belly's Pub (where 3 Steeple Street "used to be")!

Fat Belly's is a local RI Pub chain (can you really call it that if its local?) with other locations in Wakefield, East Greenwich and Warwick.The last time we were here was November 2011, wow! So in light of the kitchen renovations at The Abbey, in this pinch, let's do it again!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever. Except Hurrican Sandy and NYE 2012.

Bring a friend!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the scarf or hat in the picture, but we're not hard to find!
item.name: VENUE CHANGE - Monday Night Meetup - Fat Belly's!
